["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"目前仅同步了包括 raspios 在内的几个常用版本，以及部分工具等。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"raspios 的默认用户是 pi，密码是 raspberry，root 默认关闭。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"使用说明","children":"使用说明"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"目前本镜像包含如下内容："}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"imager"}],": Raspberry Pi Imager 官方刻录器。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"raspios_arm64"}],": Arm64 架构的 Raspberry Pi OS（Beta）"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"raspios_armhf"}],": Armhf 架构的 Raspberry Pi OS"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"raspios_full_armhf"}],": Armhf 架构的 Raspberry Pi OS，并包含官方推荐的软件"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"raspios_lite_arm64"}],": Arm64 架构的 Raspberry Pi OS（Beta，不含桌面）"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"raspios_lite_armhf"}],": Armhf 架构的 Raspberry Pi OS（不含桌面）"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"rpd_x86"}],": Raspberry Pi Desktop，用于 x86 架构的设备"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"Raspberry_Pi_Education_Manual.pdf"}],": 教学用树莓派帮助手册"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"需要安装 Raspberry Pi OS 时，一般下载 images 目录中的最新的即可，比如 arm64 的树莓派下载"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/raspios_lite_arm64/images/"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"中最新的 zip 压缩包即可，解压完 zip 压缩包后即可开始刻录。"}]]}]

meta.title: Raspberrypi OS Images 镜像使用帮助
